plain_text.en:
Hello [[firstName]] [[lastName]],
Thank you for registering on the Galapagos HCP Portal. Please confirm the consents you have provided during registration:
{{consents}}
{{consents-value}}
{{consents-end}}
We confirm that you provided a consent to receive promotional and environmental information concerning all of Galapagos products and services on your provided email address. If you wish to withdrawal this consent you can do so at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in future promotional materials.

Please click on the link below to start.

[[link]]

If you have any further queries you can reach us at support@glpg.com. For further information on the Galapagos HCP Portal, visit our website www.glpg-pro.com
Yours Sincerely,
The GLPG Team

plain_text.en:
Hello [[firstName]] [[lastName]],
Please click the button below to setup your password on the Galapagos HCP Portal. The link will be valid for only one hour.

[[link]]

If the password reset wasn't requested by you, please report the issue by replying to this mail (support@glpg.com)

Yours Sincerely,
The GLPG Team

[[loginLink]]

If the password reset wasn’t requested by you, please report the issue by replying to this mail support@glpg.com

Yours Sincerely,
The GLPG Team

subject.en: Registration verified. Please setup your password
subject.nl_nl: (NL_NL) Registration verified. Please setup your password

plain_text.en:
Hello [[firstName]] [[lastName]],
Thank you for registration. We have verified your information.

Please click the button below to setup your password on the Galapagos HCP Portal. The link will be valid for only one hour.

[[link]]

If the password reset wasn't requested by you, please report the issue by replying to this mail (support@glpg.com)

Yours Sincerely,
The GLPG Team

plain_text.en:
Hello [[firstName]] [[lastName]], 
You have successfully created an account on Galapagos HCP Portal. 
Click the link to login: 
[[loginLink]]. 
If the password reset wasn’t requested by you, please report the issue by replying to this mail support@glpg.com. 
 Yours Sincerely,
The GLPG Team
